entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 12:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %

Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
